doc.field: Memos and files related to cases reviewed by the Public Employment Relations Board (PERB) (1979-1989); PERB reappointment files (1981,1983); PERB swearing in photographs and related press; Files, agendas, minutes and memos from the Annual Meeting of the National Academy of Arbitrators (1984-1989); Pre-publication excerpts from "Between Management and Labor: Oral Histories of Arbitration" (1995); National Archive research files (1995-1996)
